forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
